title: "Cellworks Personalized Therapy Biosimulation Study Identifies Novel Biomarkers Predictive of Response in AML Patients"
excerpt: "Cellworks Group, Inc., a world leader in Personalized Medicine in the key therapeutic areas of Oncology and Immunology, today announced results from a clinical study using the Cellworks Biosimulation Platform and Computational Omics Biology Model (CBM) to predict therapy response for individual Acute Myeloid Leukemia (AML) patients were featured in a poster presentation at the 63rd American Society of Hematology (ASH) Annual Meeting and Exposition held December 11-14,"
